comment: If you can take her, TAKE her. Honestly, one of the best CS professors in the KSU department. She would absolutely make sure you left the class intrigued and knowing the material. Plus, she brings in guest lectures that make the class exciting. Would 100% recommend

Week 11/15 she was no longer our professor for some reason but she was amazing! She provided practice quizzes, dropped the lowest quiz grade, created review videos for the tests and had extra credit opportunities. I so wish she would have remained my professor because she was very caring and replied to students' emails with respect and compassion.
